Summary: UAT ES DS3 Errors in Doc 27 and Doc 03
Description:
Version: Driver 1.7.0.4



Client:

Jobsite: 65422282

When we try to upload a ticket after being produced, the pre-ticket that is showed is the Nº 27, but when HTC finishes the production it sent the doc Nº 03 and the issue is that in Driver app Mobile stills shows the Nº 27 instead of the 03. The only way to force the change is to revoke the ticket and upload it again. 

This bug occurs with Jobsites Paperless or not. Consider this scenario if HTC has a delay in sending the doc to Azure.

Step To reproduce:

# Create a ticket in RMS
# Sent it to HTC
# Do not end the production in HTC
# Upload the ticket in DriverAPP mobile.
# Go to Information, See Delivery Ticket.
# Ticket displayed Nº 27. When the fabrication is done in HTC the Doc 03 is available, but in DriverAPP still has the Doc 27.
# The only way is to change the ticket after HTC send the Doc 03 is revoking the ticket and uploading it again.
Data: uat es ds errors in doc and doc version driver clientjobsite when we try to upload a ticket after being produced the preticket that is showed is the n  but when htc finishes the production it sent the doc n and the issue is that in driver app mobile stills shows the n instead of the  the only way to force the change is to revoke the ticket and upload it again this bug occurs with jobsites paperless or not consider this scenario if htc has a delay in sending the doc to azurestep to reproduce create a ticket in rms sent it to htc do not end the production in htc upload the ticket in driverapp mobile go to information see delivery ticket ticket displayed n  when the fabrication is done in htc the doc is available but in driverapp still has the doc  the only way is to change the ticket after htc send the doc is revoking the ticket and uploading it again

Summary: UAT US DS3 - Delivery Instructions incorrectly mapped from command
Description:
We created an order of 10yards in command, after dispatching the load, we realized the Delivery instructions was showing the wrong project number:

Steps to reproduce:
1. create an order in command (this order should have 10 yards at least), using the project number 41187316 and customer id 3101088. Add Delivery instructions in the Instructions field, right below the address field.
2.  Dispatch the order.
3. Take the load in driver app. Go to the map section and look for the delivery instructions (will be blank even when this was fulfilled. Process it all the way to the end.

Summary: The epod is not being attached to the SAP reference
Description:
When a delivery is scanned in the driver app, the trip is signed and closed, the generated ePOD must be sent to SAP and attached to the delivery document and this is not happening.

User Stories related:
DCM001CX1244-9801 [MX] - Send EPOD from Azure to SAP [1st Part]
DCM001CX1244-9725[MX][BE] - Send EPOD from Azure to SAP [2nd Part]
DCM001CX1244-9811[MX] - Send EPOD from Azure to SAP [3rd Part]

Reproduction steps:
1. Create an order in SAP
2. Create the delivery and SAP shipment for the order
3. Execute the dispatch process of the delivery in SAP
4. Scan the ticket in Driver App application
5. Advance the status in Driver App application until the last step (ePOD signature)
6. Review the generated ePOD attached to the SAP delivery document in the transaction VL03N entering the Delivery document and click on the "Servicios para Objeto" icon
Data: the epod is not being attached to the sap reference when a delivery is scanned in the driver app the trip is signed and closed the generated epod must be sent to sap and attached to the delivery document and this is not happeninguser stories relatedcmcx mx  send epod from azure to sap st partdcmcxmxbe  send epod from azure to sap nd partdcmcxmx  send epod from azure to sap rd partreproduction steps create an order in sap create the delivery and sap shipment for the order execute the dispatch process of the delivery in sap scan the ticket in driver app application advance the status in driver app application until the last step epod signature review the generated epod attached to the sap delivery document in the transaction vln entering the delivery document and click on the servicios para objeto icon

Summary: UAT PH DS3 - Load status Finished - incorrect status of Signature
Description:
Test user: durawood@mailinator.com, password: Tesxg0
Test environment: [https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login|https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login]
Test customer and jobsite: 50000942, 65000881

Steps to replicate: 
1. Create sales order (VA01) in ZRQ
2. Dispatch the sales order in ZRQ, complete the statuses or shipment in ZRQ (without upload of ticket to Driver app as it´s not used in PH)
3. Access the Track app to check the delivery&load details
4. Sign the EPOD via Track app

Actual: 
The status of load in Track app never reaches "On site". It´s either Loading or Finished. 
In case that the status is Finished, the status of Signature is Pending, button appearing is Sign, however the user is not able to submit the signature - there´s internal server error appearing, see attached images (I am not able to upload video).

Expected:

Description:

1. Create sales order in ZRQ

3. Move statuses of Shipment manually in ZRQ (in PH there haven´t been deployed Drivers, they are using different GPS provider)
4. Access Track App
5. Type 100 characters in field Receiving person and sign the EPOD

Actual: 
1. There´s no counter of characters in field Receiving person. It´s difficult to estimate the 100 characters.

Expected: 
1. For easier use, a character counter should be displayed in field Receiving person
2. In case that the user types 100 allowed characters, all the test should be replicated to pdf EPOD.

To display Pricing Information (Unit Price, Amount) in ePOD the rule will be:
Cash customers = True, then show pricing info in ePOD and also show the pricing at the list of line item level
Cash customers = False , then don't show pricing info in ePOD neither pricing at line item level

*If it has “CSH” for at least one company, it is consider Cash Customer

Summary: UAT IL DS3 - EPOD not available for download for AGG deliveries in Track App IOS
Description:
Test user: sharonim@mailinator.com, password: Cemex2020
Test environment: [https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com|https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/], IOS v2.25.0.3
Test customer: 50045000, Aggregates deliveries

Steps to replicate: 
1. Create sales order for AGG in SIMMA (order No. 999215)
2. Create Weighing note for AGG delivery in SIMMA
3. Create Delivery note for AGG delivery in SIMMA - status On Site or Finished
4. Access Track app with IOS device and search for AGG delivery
5. Sign the EPOD in Track app
6. Check the pdf file EPOD in Track App

Actual: 
For AGG deliveries in Israel while using IOS device, the EPOD pdf file is not available while for RMX it can be downloaded. The EPOD cannot be downloaded in Track App IOS, but can be downloaded in Track Web. See attachments.

Expected: 
Regardless the division (RMX or AGG), the EPOD file should be available for download both in Track Web and Track App IOS.

Summary: UAT IL DS3 - Single Sign In - missing Sign button in IOS

Summary: UAT UK DS3 When driver revokes ticket after arriving at site the status in Track shows as finished.
Description:
*Data:*
Driver v1.8.4.1, Track Web, Track Android v3.14.1.3, Track IOS v2.25.0.6
paperlessGBRMX@yopmail.com, Cemex2020
JN Bentley 50211965, Whitby, Church Street
Ticket: 214741848

*Steps to Reproduce:*
Driver arrives at site and begins unloading. The Scenario tested is that the load is rejected due to technical issues (too wet etc…) and driver needs to return the load to the plant. 
Driver revokes the ticket in Driver App and once truck returns to plant the batcher needs to process the return in HTC. 
Once the return in HTC is processed the status of the load in Track still shows as “finished” which indicates to the user that the load was delivered and unloaded. This may cause confusion when calculating final quantity delivered especially if the customer is paperless as they will be relying on track to monitor quantities. 
*
Actual Behaviour:*
When driver revokes ticket and batcher has returned load in HTCthe statuses in track still show as finished and quantity is taken into account in delivered volumes. Customer can also still sign for ticket in track.

*Expected Behaviour:*
When driver has revoked ticket and batcher has returned load in HTC track should have another stated indicating that the load has been returned/revoked. This quantity should not be taken into account in the dispatched quantity in track and the customer should not be able to sign in track
In addition to the above the customer can still sign the revoked ticket in track app . If the ticket still shows as finished this may be signed in error for any future loads as the user cannot differentiate between the revoked load and the next load.

*Evidence:*


Also, the load is taken into account in the delivered quantity progress bar and order report in track.
Data: uat uk ds when driver revokes ticket after arriving at site the status in track shows as finished datadriver v track web track android v track ios vpaperlessgbrmxcom cemexjn bentley  whitby church streetticket steps to reproducedriver arrives at site and begins unloading the scenario tested is that the load is rejected due to technical issues too wet etc and driver needs to return the load to the plant driver revokes the ticket in driver app and once truck returns to plant the batcher needs to process the return in htc once the return in htc is processed the status of the load in track still shows as finished which indicates to the user that the load was delivered and unloaded this may cause confusion when calculating final quantity delivered especially if the customer is paperless as they will be relying on track to monitor quantities actual behaviourwhen driver revokes ticket and batcher has returned load in htcthe statuses in track still show as finished and quantity is taken into account in delivered volumes customer can also still sign for ticket in trackexpected behaviourwhen driver has revoked ticket and batcher has returned load in htc track should have another stated indicating that the load has been returnedrevoked this quantity should not be taken into account in the dispatched quantity in track and the customer should not be able to sign in trackin addition to the above the customer can still sign the revoked ticket in track app  if the ticket still shows as finished this may be signed in error for any future loads as the user cannot differentiate between the revoked load and the next loadevidencealso the load is taken into account in the delivered quantity progress bar and order report in track

Summary: MX S2 No se generan los cargos por cancelación
Description:
Caso: Pedido programado para el día de hoy y al realizar la cancelación se debe generar un cargo por cancelación de concreto del mismo día y el motivo es por cliente, además el estatus de cabecera debe ser “Completado - cabecera”

Se cancela la orden 0176439044
  !image-2020-06-30-15-52-05-776.png|thumbnail! 

Se muestra el mensaje de posibles cargos
  !image-2020-06-30-15-52-21-577.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2020-06-30-15-52-28-273.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2020-06-30-15-52-33-586.png|thumbnail!  

Reproducimos el caso en RMS y se crea el cargo por cancelación de concreto y se actualiza el estatus en “Completado - Cabecera”
 !image-2020-06-30-15-52-43-834.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2020-06-30-15-52-48-798.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2020-06-30-15-52-55-948.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2020-06-30-15-53-00-590.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2020-06-30-15-53-06-387.png|thumbnail! 
 
En conclusión: Al cancelar del mismo día, con motivo de cliente no esta creando el cargo por cancelación
Data: mx s no se generan los cargos por cancelacin caso pedido programado para el da de hoy y al realizar la cancelacin se debe generar un cargo por cancelacin de concreto del mismo da y el motivo es por cliente adems el estatus de cabecera debe ser completado  cabecerase cancela la orden imagepngthumbnail se muestra el mensaje de posibles cargos imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail reproducimos el caso en rms y se crea el cargo por cancelacin de concreto y se actualiza el estatus en completado  cabecera imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail en conclusin al cancelar del mismo da con motivo de cliente no esta creando el cargo por cancelacin

Summary: MX DS2 Hora requerida incorrecta en modificación
Description:
* Cliente tiene un pedido confirmado
* Solicita en OLS una modificación
* Coloca una nueva hora requerida y OLS hace una contrapropuesta
* El cliente acepta la hora propuesta
* En RMS aparece la misma hora de entrega y requerida

Resultado esperado: Muestre en el campo la hora requerida por el cliente al solicitar la modificación

Ejemplo:
* Pedido 8009926715 nuevo desde OLS programado a las 12 hrs requerido y con disponibilidad a misma hr 
* Modificación para misma fecha pero a las 7 am por solicitud de cliente. Al validar disponibilidad no hay dicho horario, arroja 9 am horario mas cercano al requerido.- cliente acepta dicho horario 9 am y se acepta pedido.
* Lo correcto es que en requerido asigne 7 am ya que era la nueva hr requerida por el cliente en la modificación.
*
 !image-2020-08-25-12-00-10-078.png|thumbnail!
Data: mx ds hora requerida incorrecta en modificacin  cliente tiene un pedido confirmado solicita en ols una modificacin coloca una nueva hora requerida y ols hace una contrapropuesta el cliente acepta la hora propuesta en rms aparece la misma hora de entrega y requeridaresultado esperado muestre en el campo la hora requerida por el cliente al solicitar la modificacinejemplo pedido nuevo desde ols programado a las hrs requerido y con disponibilidad a misma hr  modificacin para misma fecha pero a las am por solicitud de cliente al validar disponibilidad no hay dicho horario arroja am horario mas cercano al requerido cliente acepta dicho horario am y se acepta pedido lo correcto es que en requerido asigne am ya que era la nueva hr requerida por el cliente en la modificacin imagepngthumbnail

Summary: MX DS2 Eliminar Reanudar pedido en Reserva Anticipada
Description:
Al solicitar un pedido internamente se crea con estatus de Reserva Anticipada
En los call actions en Historial de Pedidos aparece la opción de Continuar con el pedido debido a que aparece con estatus En Espera

No debe estar el call action de Continuar con el pedido

Ejemplo:
* Pedido 8009926715 se modifica producto el cual aparece reserva anticipada en RMX y en OLS “En espera”
* A este pedido en OLS aparecen las opciones de “Continuar con orden” y “Repetir pedido”

 !image-2020-08-25-12-19-25-705.png|thumbnail!
Data: mx ds eliminar reanudar pedido en reserva anticipada al solicitar un pedido internamente se crea con estatus de reserva anticipadaen los call actions en historial de pedidos aparece la opcin de continuar con el pedido debido a que aparece con estatus en esperano debe estar el call action de continuar con el pedidoejemplo pedido se modifica producto el cual aparece reserva anticipada en rmx y en ols en espera a este pedido en ols aparecen las opciones de continuar con orden y repetir pedido imagepngthumbnail

Summary: UAT UK DS3 - UK Paperless Testing – Redirected load – Error 145
Description:
*Data:*

Driver App v1.8.5.11

Initial Ticket: 214747299

Redirect Ticket: 214747302

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# 1.Add original ticket to driver app (214747299)
2.Arrive at jobsite (status automatically updated to “on site” after approx 3 mins once geofence hit)
3.Customer rejects load
4.Redirect processed in SAP/RMS
5.Original ticket is completed in driver app with notes to confirm redirect
6.Press “add” in driver app
7.Ticket DID NOT automatically pull (same truck so should have)
8.Once completed add ticket for redirection manually (214747302)
9.Error 145 message appeared
Could not pull the second load onto the driver app (Tony Connolly confirmed that status was “to site” in SAP)

{color:#d04437}*Actual behavior:*{color}
“add” button did not pull ticket automatically. Error 145 message when tried to pull manually

{color:#14892c}*Expected behavior:*{color}
When the 1^st^ ticket is completed the driver should press “add” in driver app and the next ticket should pull automatically for the redirection. Failing this the driver should be able to pull ticket manually by entering the sap delivery number. This also failed.

*Evidence:*

!image-20200901-111642.png|width=905,height=509!

!image-20200901-111655.png|width=461,height=736!

Summary: Drivers_USA_Android_Drum counter fields are mandatories in drivers app
Description:
*Bug instructions*
1. Add ticket in drivers app
2. Click on "NEXT (DELIVERY PROCESS)"
3. Go to "Extras" section and click on "Add info"
4. Scroll down and mark any checkbox for Drum Counter
5. Save changes

*Bug description*
When user save or confirm the updates, a message is displayed indicating "Extra values can´t be empty"



{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
Add a new concept to the "Add Extra" section, in Customer Extra section, it will be named "Drum Counter" (attachment), *These fields are not mandatory*

* Drum Counter - Before leaving Plant
* Drum Counter - On arrival
* Drum Counter - Before unloading

Summary: CX024GO2005-9 - Log out from select jobsites view
Description:
There is not option to  log out from jobsite screen view, you must select a jobsite and then log off
Or by forcing to close the aplication with X
Both phones Android / IOS

----

Expected behaviors:

* Scenario 1: *User with no jobsites assigned* in “Select jobsite” screen
** User sees empty state with LOGOUT call to action button
** User clicks Logout
** Dialog box pops up to confirm if he/she wants to log out
*** User clicks confirm - App logs out and goes to login screen
*** User clicks cancel - Dialog box closes and user sees empty screen
** If user clicks back button/gesture in mobile device
*** app goes to background, 
*** user goes to his/her home screen
*** user stays logged in

* Scenario 2: *User with jobsites assigned* in “Select jobsite” screen
** User sees list of jobsites
** If user clicks back button in mobile 
*** app goes to background, 
*** user goes to his/her home screen
** If user want to log out, he/she needs to 
*** go to the Orders screen, 
*** click on the hamburger menu icon, 
*** click logout option

Summary: In Orders View the days of the week are wrong
Description:
When the user is browsing the list of orders, some of the headings for the days in the list show the incorrect name of the week (also the day marked "_Today_" is incorrect). This seems to happen only to days where there are no orders. The day for today is shown in bold correctly, but shows the weekday wrong (for example if today is Thursday October 22nd, it shows _Wednesday_ instead of showing _Today_).

For example for October 18, 2020, the day is shown as "_Saturday 18, 2020_" instead of "_Sunday 18, 2020_"

Tested in Hebrew with user shatit@mailinator.com and in English with user blazona.da.test@mailinator.com and the language/country presents the same problem.

The time zone does seem to matter. The problem appears in time zone GMT-5 (Monterrey , Mexico), but for time zone GMT+3 (Jerusalem, Israel) the issue doesn't seem to occur.



Time zone configurations: for Mexico’s timezone at 17:xx pm ({{wongday_timezone Mexico.png}}) and for Israel 1:xx am of the next day ({{wrongday timezone Israel.png}})


!wongday_timezone Mexico.png|width=41.666666666666664%!

!wrongday timezone Israel.png|width=41.666666666666664%!



we see that days w/o orders show the wrong name of the week but on days with orders it seems to be ok ({{wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok, empty days wrong timezone MX.png}}), in IL time zone it looks ok ({{wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok, empty too timezone IL.png}}). This is for user [blazona.da.test@mailinator.com|mailto:blazona.da.test@mailinator.com] in United States.

!wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok, empty days wrong timezone MX.png|width=50%!

!wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok, empty too timezone IL.png|width=50%!



Also, the label for today’s date is wrong ({{wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 1 dia today equivocado timezone MX.png}}), in Israel’s time zone it looks ok ({{wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 0 dia today ok timezone IL.png}})

!wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 1 dia today equivocado timezone MX.png|width=50%!

!wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 0 dia today ok timezone IL.png|width=50%!



In the following screenshot we see that if we log in with a user from Israel (and the UI switches to Hebrew) for October 20 the label is שני like it is for October 19 and it should be שלישי. Also, when the today date is Thursday October 22, on that line it should say zToday but instead it shows רביעי (Wednesday) ({{wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected, timezone-MX.png}}). Compared in Israel’s time zone ({{wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected, timezone-IL (today changed to Friday, since it's the next day there, 1_19 am).png}})

!wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected, timezone-MX.png|width=50%!

!wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected, timezone-IL (today changed to Friday, since it's the next day there, 1_19 am).png|width=50%!





For days with orders here’s comparison between Mexico’s time zone ({{wrongday_he_il capE jamishi repeated for 15 and 16 timezone MX.png}}) and Israel’s time zone ({{wrongday_he_il capE jamishi repeated for 15 and 16 timezone IL.png}}). Note that the days with orders looks ok, but that October 16 is empty and in Mexico’s time zone the day is shown as חמישי but it should be שישי like in Israel’s timezone.

Summary: Order Status not updated on detail
Description:
When the user selects an order to see its detail, and the order status is in a status 
<statusA>, and go back to the orders list view and the order change its status to a next status 
    <statusB>. After refreshing the list, the order status its updated to the 
        <statusB>, but the user checks de order detail again, the status of the order remains as <statusA>.

Steps to reproduce:
Create an order in SIMMA, verify its shown in calendar orders view as confirmed.
Open the order details and verify its shown as confirmed.
Batch the order in SIMMA and wait for it to be integrated and processed by onminchannel to sync the order status.
Return to the calendar orders view and verify the order is now In Progress.
Open the order detail again and verify the status.

Actual Result:
The Order remains in status Confirmed.

Expected Result: 
The order should be shown in the new status In Progress as it is in calendar orders view.

 !image-2020-11-05-10-13-03-336.png|thumbnail! 

 !image-2020-11-05-10-13-50-689.png|thumbnail!
Data: order status not updated on detail when the user selects an order to see its detail and the order status is in a status statusa and go back to the orders list view and the order change its status to a next status statusb after refreshing the list the order status its updated to the statusb but the user checks de order detail again the status of the order remains as statusasteps to reproducecreate an order in simma verify its shown in calendar orders view as confirmedopen the order details and verify its shown as confirmedbatch the order in simma and wait for it to be integrated and processed by onminchannel to sync the order statusreturn to the calendar orders view and verify the order is now in progressopen the order detail again and verify the statusactual resultthe order remains in status confirmedexpected result the order should be shown in the new status in progress as it is in calendar orders view imagepngthumbnail imagepngthumbnail

b) 10 tubos... * 5 mins cada uno = 50 mins + 20 de promedio de instalación de la bomba.
c) inicio de bombeo es a las 9 am, y dice que la bomba inicia su cilclo a las 8:10, + 70 mins que tiene que llegar antes para instalarse... debería ser 7:50 am y aparte el trayecto de donde sale la bomba  a la obra

# Ver pantalla anexas

Date time: GMT+1
User: tison@mailinator.com
Pass: Cemex2020

The status of the order are not clear. When the user create the order with the app, the status is "Envoyé" (means "Send"). Then, if the order is created in RMS and validated in the order console, the status is "Non commencé" (means "not started"). 

Is it possible to add the status "Confirmé" (means "Confirmed") ? By this way the user know their order is taken into account. This status should appear when the order is confirmed in the order console. The status "non commencé" could appear the day of the delivery. By this way, the user know if the production started or not and it is easir to track the delivery.

Summary: PP - API Calendartypes error 400
Description:
The API [https://pp.cemexgo.com/api/v4/cum/customers/calendartypes|https://pp.cemexgo.com/api/v4/cum/customers/calendartypes] had a 400 error.That value is need it to determine the calendar type for customer if we do not receive any response the flow changes to the Request experience instead the online. That defect is blocking the Adjustment for cash orders functionality to be tested by the RMX operation.

\{
"httpCode": "400",
"httpMessage": "BadRequest",
"reasonCode": "51000",
"moreInformation": null
}

So far the diagnostic is the the applicationid received are marked as MRP500 instead MR3500. That API has an orchestration from the Partners API (/v1/rm/otf/partners)  from RMX.
Data: pp  api calendartypes error the api  had a errorthat value is need it to determine the calendar type for customer if we do not receive any response the flow changes to the request experience instead the online that defect is blocking the adjustment for cash orders functionality to be tested by the rmx operationhttpcode httpmessage badrequestreasoncode moreinformation nullso far the diagnostic is the the applicationid received are marked as mrp instead mr that api has an orchestration from the partners api vrmotfpartners from rmx

Summary: Delay in statuses
Description:
I created the first order for 3 M3. It worked ok…. But the statues were in a delay

And then I created an order for 25 M3.
Order 276166
The first delivery supposed to be on 7 M3
So when I started the loading the statues haven’t change. Then I change the status in Simma – to left the plant.
The status in the app still – approved
(see Image 1)
 
When I added time to site arrival
That's what is happening.
We have 1 order for 25 m3 that is in status approved.
And then we see another order – the same number (I think it's the problem with the 12 digit…) that it's in process..

(see Image 2)
 
When I change the statues in Simma to start unloading
 (see Image 3)
That's what I see in the app:
Complete without volume:
 
 (see Image 4+5)
When I add time in Simma for end loading end leaving the plant – the info in the app hasn't changed (and there is a problem with the marked word that's supposed to be in the same line…)

 (see Image 6)
I have tried another order when I choose the correct order number in the console
In Simma the truck finish loading – the statues in the app – still approved, it took a few minutes to the statues to change to in progress…
In Simma it's already left the plant
 (see Image 7)
in the app it took couple of minutes and some refreshing of the page to see the change in the statues
Data: delay in statuses i created the first order for m it worked ok but the statues were in a delayand then i created an order for morder the first delivery supposed to be on mso when i started the loading the statues havent change then i change the status in simma to left the plantthe status in the app still approvedsee image  when i added time to site arrivalthats what is happeningwe have order for m that is in status approvedand then we see another order the same number i think its the problem with the digit that its in processsee image  when i change the statues in simma to start unloading see image thats what i see in the appcomplete without volume see image when i add time in simma for end loading end leaving the plant the info in the app hasnt changed and there is a problem with the marked word thats supposed to be in the same line see image i have tried another order when i choose the correct order number in the consolein simma the truck finish loading the statues in the app still approved it took a few minutes to the statues to change to in progressin simma its already left the plant see image in the app it took couple of minutes and some refreshing of the page to see the change in the statues

Description:

1) Open driver's app

4) Press enter
5) Enter customer number/Jobsite Number
6) Press "Ok" and you get the error

*Details of the ticket* :

Customer Number : 50085725

Customer: 050085645

Description:
Evidence
 !image-2021-05-18-17-09-22-029.png|thumbnail!

Steps

Summary: PL DS3 Wrong status of the AGG Loads (OTF)
Description:
[https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login|https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login]
test.agg@mailinator.com, Cemex2021\!

Wrong statuses of Loads are being shown in Track. Some of them appear in status “On Route”, some in status “Finished”.

!image-2021-05-20-14-50-50-074.png|width=200,height=183!

Here is an example of a Load (227946930), which was dispatched, so the status changed to "Loading" at 10:31 and then it was immediately changed to "On Route":

!image-2021-05-20-14-35-09-498.png|width=200,height=183!

This can happen if the same truck is being used for several deliveries at the same time. [~accountid:5a6ae6a1187efa232b09df1a] helped me to analyze the issue:

“As requested below are the records I could find from CRQ relating to the load raised by Lukasz. I hope this helps in your identification of the Bug reported.
 
Order              0227946930
Delivery           0227946958
Shipment        0122846592    Load dispatched on 18.05.2021 at 10:31:22 local time

My check in SAP shows the following:

Record of the dispatch which you can see is the last one for this vehicle – nothing has been dispatched since using it.

!1.jpg|width=200,height=183!

Messages from CRQ have all been created correctly and no errors reported on integration to Azure – BTW there are many more messages for this order compared to the one we did earlier as this has deliveries created for the multiple items in the order.

I have highlighted the relevant message updating the Shipment confirming dispatch which I understand will update Azure to “Loading” status.

!2.jpg|width=200,height=183!

The result in the Track console is shown below as Lukasz has provided – it seems there is another load from the same order with the same issue (delivery 227946957). 

The other loads are Finished – presumably because those vehicles have been re-used on other jobs.

!3.jpg|width=200,height=183!

By comparison below are the messages generated for the order / delivery / shipment that you observed during our call which resulted in a successful integration to Azure and the load status set correctly as “Loading”. 

Order              0227947086
Delivery           0227947091
Shipment        0122846636

!4.jpg|width=200,height=183!

The result was a successful integration and correct status for the load.

!5.jpg|width=200,height=183!

I hope this helps.”

Summary: UK UATS DS3 Drivers App - RMX - Incorrect truck dispatched on and needs changing.
Description:
When testing this scenario, once production has commenced, the ability to change the fleet number in the ‘Deliveries Maintenance Report’ can only be done once production is complete. If done, the process will replace the fleet number of the delivery to the new requested one and complete the service returning both vehicles to be available at the plant but also complete the affected delivery in SAP. The Driver can assign the now changed delivery to their tablet, but the Dispatch Console used by Batchers and Shippers will no longer display delivery status’s or waiting time from the tablet.

Driver app 1.8.8.14. 
Customer Account 50219878.
Sap delivery number 227946618.
Dispatched on Truck registration PO67VOA.
Changed in Delivery Maintenance Report to truck registration PO67VJL.
Books the truck back to the plant.
The ticket populated onto the tablet and ran through correctly.
But the Dispatch Console used by Batchers and Shippers will no longer display delivery status’s or waiting time from the tablet.
Expected behaviour the truck registration to change and be able to be tracked by both the Cemexgo system and Batchers and Shippers as well as to populate the waiting times on the dispatch console.

Actual behaviour the truck registration changed and be able to tracked by both Cemexgo system and the Batchers and shippers dispatch console and for it to include the waitings times in the waiting time report.

 !image-2021-05-20-16-41-58-870.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2021-05-20-16-42-42-237.png|thumbnail!

Summary: Internal Server Error for delivery day major to 12
Description:
The GET API response (/v6/sm/otf/orders/multiple?batches=) is Internal system error (code 500) for documents with delivery day major to 12. For example: June 13th, May 20th, etc. 
The date is created automatically using the downloaded excel format from CEMEX Go.

Testing data:
Customer:50025163
Job site: 66840978
User: ferreterachamizaluser@mailinator.com
batches IDs with this error : 114, 115, 116 and 125

Note: It seems that the API is interpreting the format as mm/dd/yy but the date format in the excel is dd/mm/yy.

Summary: DS2 Order Taking RMS. VAP  doesnt show correct the vap over Mix Concrete
Description:
we have a mix concrete that has value added product  as a subitem into the contract CXGO need to show me those value added product into the combos  as a defintion of  user story
..........................................................................................................................
Description
As a Customer I want to be able to select the value-added products for my concrete mix from the options defined in my contract so that my order is created with a correct and valid mix.


Acceptance Criteria
When the Ready-mix product and contract are selected, the value-added options should be pre-filled with the values available in my contract for that concrete material.
Only the proposed value-added materials from the contract are the ones that can be displayed and selected; a maximum of 4 value-added materials can be included in the mix.
If an additional value-added from the available options is required, that value need to be added to the contract.

If no value added is on contract, there will be no available options to be selected con value-added functionality.

Same logic should be applied to call actions, modify and repeat.

............................................................

Summary: QA - UK Driver app iOS app freezing at random screens
Description:
QA - UK Driver app iOS app freezing at random screens

*Description*
Drivers App over multiple tests today has been freezing in random places or not responding which you had to force close and reopen for the app to work as expected.

Summary: FR- QA- EPOD in not available in CX GO & Driver's App
Description:
EPOD is not downloadable from CX GO- Track and not available in driver's app also after completing the Delivery Ticket in Driver's App for Aggregate business line for the order 2012011634 and Delivery 310760616. 

 When I click on *"Download EPOD"* in CX GO, I get a pop-up message *EPOD not available. Try Again Later*. 
When I check completed/finished delivery ticket in Driver's App History Option , I get the pop-up stating that *Cannot Download Delivery Ticket ( See Screenshot Driver's DT).*

Steps to replicate the issue: 

CX GO

1) Create an order & delivery in SAP for Aggregate business line
2) Feed the Delivery Ticket in Driver's App
3) Compete the ticket with required info ( On Site, Unloading Start , Unloading End etc.) 
4) Login to CX GO
5) Go to Track -> Cement and Aggregates -> Click on the order  -> Loads -> Click on the ticket -> Click on Download EPOD
6) Pop-up message appears stating *EPOD not available. Try Later
*

Driver's App

1) Open the Driver's App (version 1.8.8.18 for Android)
2) Select the country as FR
3) Click on Add
4) Put the ticket number then customer/jobsite number
5) Finish the load after putting the required details ( On Site, Unloading Start , Unloading End etc.)
6) Go to History and click on info for the delivery you want to check 
7) Click on View Delivery Ticket , you will see a pop up message  ( Screenshot Driver's DT).

Summary: [Command] Parameters timeout, retry and time  between retries for the webjob need to be configurable.
Description:
Per the story [https://cemexpmo.atlassian.net/browse/CX030GO2103-968|https://cemexpmo.atlassian.net/browse/CX030GO2103-968]  The following parameters need to be configurable. Currently they are not.

Timeout Limits

Number of Retrys

Time between retrys.

Time to wait for acknowledgement by Timeout.

Time to wait for acknowledgement by Async Messages.

** Global param to enable/disable webjob.
Data: command parameters timeout retry and time between retries for the webjob need to be configurable per the story  the following parameters need to be configurable currently they are nottimeout limitsnumber of retrystime between retrystime to wait for acknowledgement by timeouttime to wait for acknowledgement by async messages global param to enabledisable webjob

Summary: DE, ES- QA- Delivery ticket is not available in Driver's app
Description:
While finishing one of the loads in driver's app I have noticed that he delivery ticket is not available in *Details and notes- View delivery ticket* on customer's signature screen. 

*Steps to Replicate the issue:*

Open the driver’s app

Select the country

Put the ticket number & customer number 

Click on delivery process and put the required details

On customer signature screen → Go to Details and notes → View delivery ticket → Nothing happens

Also, when I check the delivery ticket before and after finishing the load in driver's app . I do not find the delivery ticket.

*Before Finishing the loads:*

Open the driver’s app

Select the country

Put the ticket number & customer number 

Click on “info”

Click on “view delivery ticket”, nothing happens.

*After Finishing the loads:*

Open the driver’s app

Select the country

Put the ticket number & customer number 

Click on delivery process and complete the tickets

Go to history → Click on info → view delivery ticket , nothing happens

*Data:*

*ES*

*Delivery Ticket-  M4600001000018*
*Customer - 50069245*
*Jobsite - 65200695*

*DE*

*Steps to replicate the issue:*

* Create a delivery ticket for CEM business line
* Put the delivery ticket number and customer/jobsite number in the Driver app
* Check the Load in the Track App, the status has been changed to “On route” 
* Go to the Driver App and click on NEXT (delivery process) button to change the status to the next one manually
* Check the Load in the Track App, the status has not been changed and stayed on the “On route”

* Finish the ticket in the Driver App

Summary: FR- RMX- QA- Sign Option Not available on Track App & Load statuses are not synced with driver's app in Track App and CX GO
Description:
I do not see any sign option in Track App for FR. I put the delivery ticket details in Driver's app. Selected the time (On site, Unloading Start, Unloading End) and checked the Track After every step. I do not see sign option in Track App. I did not see the sign option even after completing the load in Driver's app.

After completing the load I checked the Track app and CX GO, EPOD is available on both the platforms with Driver's app sign. But the load status are not same.

*Steps to reproduce the issue:*

1) Create an RMX order and delivery ticket
2) Put the delivery ticket details in driver's app
3) Login to track app
